Blending Japanese lyrics with R&B vibes, this timeless song redefined the J-POP landscape and became a cornerstone of Heisei-era pop music.With the clear and expressive voice of SynthV Moka Miyamai, we recreated the nostalgic sound of the late 90s in a modern AI vocal arrangement. Enjoy the fusion of old-school vibes and new technology in this tribute to a legendary track.ğŸ”¸Original Song: Hikaru Utada ğŸ”¸Lyrics & Music: Hikaru Utada ğŸ”¸Release Year: 1998
